    Create a drug target proxy instrument

    drug_target_proxy.Rd

    Create a drug target proxy instrument base on several association statistics

    drug_target_proxy(
  gwas_gene,
  gene_chr,
  gene_start,
  gene_end,
  gene_flanks = 5e+05,
  build = "GRCh37",
  clump = TRUE,
  clump_ref = which_1000G_reference("GRCh37"),
  p1 = 5e-08,
  p2 = 1,
  r2 = 0.2,
  kb = 250,
  join_key = "RSID",
  QTL_list = list(),
  concordance = data.table::data.table(data_name_1 = character(), data_name_2 =
    character(), concordant = logical())
)

    gwas_gene

    .

    gene_chr

    .

    gene_start

    .

    gene_end

    .

    gene_flanks

    build

    clump

    clump_ref

    p1

    p2

    kb

    join_key
